Ref: When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the ARN of the configuration created.

GetAtt.Description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the EventRule. AWS CloudFormation stack generates this ARN and then uses this ARN associated with the NotificationConfiguration.
The creation time of the EventRule.
A list of Amazon EventBridge Managed Rule ARNs associated with this EventRule.
